I am an assistant professor with the Theory of Computer Science Group from the Informatics Institute of the University of Amsterdam (UvA). While I have broad interests in much of theoretical computer science, most of my work focuses on coding theory, cryptography, and their intersection.Prior to joining the UvA, I was a postdoctoral researcher in the Cryptology Group at the Centrum Wiskunde & Informatica (CWI), hosted by Ronald Cramer.
